Comment: \> So he's saying there's communication and a deal is on the way.  I haven't seen anywhere that Trump or Bessent are saying the communication is *with China*, just that discussions/communication are "happening".  The call is coming from inside the White House.  That ties in with Trump's repeated statement that if China doesn't negotiate terms, he'll set the terms as well as the tariffs will come down, but not to 0 and some casually floating a number like 25% or 45% on goods of a non-national security standing and 100% of ones identified as having a national security component (implemented over a period of five years to allow for the creation of domestic manufacturing).    His handlers have to see this 'reset' as their least worst option: taking away all of the reciprocal tariffs *for now*, which could open negotiations with China by taking them back to the original 15% plus the global 10% with some magical hand-waving, add the *concept of  plan* mechanic giving markets the appearance of stability for a week or two, which they imagine gets the market back in to 'line goes up' mode and lets Trump get back to demonizing marginalized people and destroying democracy in an effort to get his polling numbers back up with billionaires.
